name: Spicy Thai Pasta Salad
author: lutzflcat
summary: This robust salad is delicious on its own, but easily can be turned into a main course by adding a protein such as shrimp, chicken, or tofu.
ingredients: ¼ cup thinly sliced red bell pepper
½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste
directions: Whisk sesame oil, vegetable oil, soy sauce, balsamic vinegar, fish sauce, chili-garlic sauce, lime juice, rice vinegar, and sugar for dressing together in a small bowl until well combined
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook bow-tie pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Drain pasta, rinse with cold water, and return to the pot
Drizzle dressing over the pasta, stir gently to combine
Add peas, carrots, bell pepper, green onions, cilantro, peanuts, and red pepper flakes; stir until well combined
Serve at room temperature with lime wedges, or chill in the refrigerator for about 1 hour or longer
